entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:55 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:55 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:55 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
